If <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label=" the integral from 1 to 2 of f of open parentheses x minus c close parentheses with respect to x equals 5">
 <semantics>
 <mrow>

 <mrow><munderover>

 <mn>1</mn>
 <mn>2</mn>
 </munderover>

 </mrow>

</mstyle><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>c</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow>

 where c is a constant, then <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from 1 minus c to 2 minus c of f of x with respect to x equals">
 <semantics>
 <mrow>
 <mstyle displaystyle="true">

 <mo>∫</mo>
 <mrow>

 </munderover>
 <mi>f</mi>
 </mrow>

</mstyle><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow>
